h3.a: Frenship ISD Welcomes New Band and Fine Arts Director

div.div: Frenship ISD is excited to announce the addition of Dr. Ryan S. Smith as the new Band and Fine Arts Director for the District pending approval by the Frenship ISD Board of Trustees next month.

img.alt: curbside meals, free food for all children

h3.a: Frenship ISD & Aramark to Offer Curbside Meals for Seven Days a Week

div.div: Starting Monday, April 27, Frenship ISD and Aramark will increase the number of meals provided at no cost to children in the community. Families will now be able to pick up breakfast and lunch for all seven days of the week.

h3.a: Frenship Schools to Remain Closed Through End of School Year

div.div: Texas Governor Greg Abbott announced all Texas schools will remain closed through the remainder of the school year. Click here to read more.

img.div: Frenship ISD's mission is to educate and develop all students by providing a foundation to empower them to reach their maximum potential and realize their opportunity of choice. To read more about our vision, beliefs, and learner and leader profiles CLICK HERE.
